name: Eww, Zombos!
description:
This game is under continual development.

You're a professional zombie exterminator. Yes, that's a thing. Get paid by the kill to defend helpless civilians from the undead.

Update 09/15/18

- 7 new levels

- Fixed bugs

- New weapons

- New enemies

- Misc tweaks


Updated 09/13/18 - Fixed zombie stuck bug - Tweaked weapons and prices - Added new weapon

ESC: pause

Left click/tap: shoot Buttons at top to change weapon
